summary.span: El espacio de nombres System.Xml.Xsl proporciona compatibilidad con transformaciones XSLT (Extensible Stylesheet Transformation).

span.span: The System.Xml.Xsl namespace provides support for Extensible Stylesheet Transformation (XSLT) transforms.

summary.span: Admite la Recomendaci√≥n XSL Transformations (XSLT) Version 1.0 del Consorcio W3C.

span.span: It supports the W3C XSL Transformations (XSLT) Version 1.0 Recommendation.
